overview: Tommy the goalie is between a rock and a hard place- his coach and teammates mercilessly fuck him senseless for every goal scored against him. But the leader of a hooligan gang falls head over heels for Tommy and shows him how hot sex with a man can be. Tommy then takes his revenge on his team with his new skinhead buddies. They save their worst for the coach. FANATICS is sex, love and violence in the rough and tumble world of soccer.
title: Fanatics
